rules_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on dealt combat damage to a player this turn.
Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
flavor_text: [i]“You've beaten every challenge so far. Whatever those things are, they're just another victory waiting to be claimed!”[/i]
